mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_SEQ , M.MENU_NAME , O.QUANTITY , O.DISCOUNT_PRICE , O.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE FROM TORDER O , TMENU M WHERE O.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO AND O.STORE_NO = ${storeNo} AND O.TABLE_NO = ${tableNo}
SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_SEQ FROM TORDER O ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO DESC, O.ORDER_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TORDER (`MENU_NO`, `SALE_PRICE`, `QUANTITY`, `DISCOUNT_PRICE`, `ORDER_DATE`, `CANCLE_DATE`, `INSERT_ID`, `INSERT_DATE`, `MODIFY_ID`, `MODIFY_DATE`, `FULL_PRICE_YN`, `FULL_PER_YN`, `SEL_PRICE_YN`, `SEL_PER_YN`, `SERVICE_YN`, `ORDER_SEQ`, `ORDER_STATUS_NO`, `TOTAL_SALE_PRICE`, `ORDER_NO`, `STORE_NO`, `TABLE_NO` ) VALUES (#{menuNo}, #{salePrice}, #{quantity}, #{discountPrice}, NOW(), NULL, #{insertId}, NOW(), #{modifyId}, NOW(), #{fullPriceYn}, #{fullPerYn}, #{selPriceYn}, #{selPerYn}, #{serviceYn}, #{orderSeq}, #{orderStatusNo}, #{totalSalePrice}, #{orderNo}, #{storeNo}, #{tableNo} )
